variables.input:
Fetch logs
|filter k8s.container.name == "cartservice" and  matchesPhrase(content, "AddItemAsync")
|parse content, "LD 'productId='LD:productId ','"
|fields productId

0.query:
Fetch logs
|filter k8s.container.name == "cartservice" and  matchesPhrase(content, "AddItemAsync")
|parse content, "LD 'userId='LD:userId', productId='LD:productId', quantity='INT:quantity"
|fields userId, productId, quantity
| filter in(productId, $ProductID)
|summarize sum(quantity), Alias: Quantity

1.query:
Fetch logs
|filter k8s.container.name == "cartservice" and  matchesPhrase(content, "AddItemAsync")
|parse content, "LD 'userId='LD:userId', productId='LD:productId', quantity='INT:quantity"
|fields userId, productId, quantity, timestamp
| filter in(productId, $ProductID)
|makeTimeseries sum(quantity), Alias:Quantity

2.query:
Fetch logs
|filter k8s.container.name == "cartservice" and  matchesPhrase(content, "AddItemAsync")
|parse content, "LD 'userId='LD:userId', productId='LD:productId', quantity='INT:quantity"
|fields userId, productId, quantity
| filter in(productId, $ProductID)
|summarize sum(quantity), Alias:Quantity, by:{productId}
